lead_paragraph: A restaurant in Floral Park, Queens (a trek for some), specializes in chaat, the tangy bites sold on Indian roadsides.

headline.print_headline: It’s Closer Than India, but Still …
headline.main: Mumbai Xpress, a Good Reason to Stray for a Snack
